sentences.en: a peanut butter and jelly sandwich
sentences.cn: 一份花生酱加果酱三明治

sentences.en: Do you think this jelly's firm enough to eat yet ?
sentences.cn: 你以为这果子冻已经硬得可以吃了 吗 ?

sentences.en: frogs’ eggs floating in a protective jelly
sentences.cn: 包在胶质卵囊里浮在水中的蛙卵

sentences.en: health food products containing royal jelly
I had two peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 我吃了两个放了花生酱和果酱的三明治。

sentences.en: Royal jelly is effective in treating nervous exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 蜂皇精治神经衰弱很有效.

sentences.en: Some have referred to it by the unappetizing name " capital jelly ".
sentences.cn: 某些人把它称为 “ 资本浆糊 ” 这一倒胃口的名字.

sentences.en: The jelly has not set yet.
They removed royal jelly for medicinal use.
sentences.cn: 他们把蜂王浆取出用作药品.

sentences.en: We had toast and jelly at breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我们早餐吃的是烤面包和果冻.

sentences.en: You can buy a formulation containing royal jelly, pollen and vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 可以买一种含蜂王浆、花粉和维生素C的配方产品。

sentences.en: You may leave the jelly in a cool place to harden it.
sentences.cn: 你可以把果子冻放在阴凉的地方,让它凝固.

sentences.en: You've cleared all the jelly - fish out of the way.

words.tran_cn: 涂凝胶物的；凝成胶状的
变成胶冻；使成胶质（jelly的过去分词）
使成凝胶状；使成果子冻

phrases.tran_cn: 水母；海蜇；[口]软弱无力的人

trans.tran_en: a soft sweet food made from fruit juice and gelatin
